MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G69 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.58AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate reports of damage to a substation. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11.00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 9.57AM on 05 December 2020.
